title: 4 Bed room house for sale
details:
Granite and tile flooring
Grohe and semi luxury bathroom fittings.
Front yard with a wicket gate
Garage Porch for 2 vehicles with a Roller shutter door
1km to Colombo MC border
2.5km to Negombo Road
Clean and Clear property documents, mortgaged in Commercial Bank.
STRICTLY NO BROKERS PL.
